name: Stickman High Diving PRO - Touch, Jump & Flip!
name_original: Stickman High Diving PRO - Touch, Jump & Flip!
description:
*Over 800,000 downloads!*

From the creators of the #1 game Stickman Trampoline..

Flip and dive from soaring heights in this amazingly addictive game! For each level you're required to land a perfect dive, and our judges will rate you based on your landing. If you hit the target score, you move upward to onward to harder dives!

Play without ads in this PRO version!

User Reviews:
"Amazing game so addictive" - Bananzy1234
"The best diver game...Simple to grasp, but challenging enough to keep you playing..." -Pickles831

FEATURES INCLUDE:

* Easy to learn, hard to master!
* Jump from up to 100 meters
* 7 unique stick characters. Unlock them all to upgrade your skills!
* 6 diving locations to unlock and explore
* Game Center Leaderboards
* Endless levels for hours of fun!

Join over 3 million Stickman fans, and download Stickman High Diving NOW!
